statements: SELECT * FROM PrivacySettings
SELECT user_id, data_sharing FROM PrivacySettings WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT device_id, location_sharing FROM PrivacySettings WHERE user_id = 'a8055e7c-7e0c-4e13-b959-7cf6de619d1f'
SELECT * FROM PrivacySettings ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PrivacySettings WHERE data_sharing = TRUE
SELECT * FROM PrivacySettings WHERE data_sharing = TRUE
SELECT user_id, location_sharing FROM PrivacySettings WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM PrivacySettings ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT device_id, user_id FROM PrivacySettings WHERE user_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9876-543210987654'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PrivacySettings
SELECT * FROM PrivacySettings;
SELECT id, user_id, data_share_permission FROM PrivacySettings;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM IoTDevices WHERE owner_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM PrivacySettings JOIN IoTDevices ON PrivacySettings.device_id = IoTDevices.device_id;
SELECT * FROM PrivacySettings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE owner_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, data_share_permission FROM PrivacySettings WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat' AND location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoTDevices WHERE owner_id = 2 AND device_type IN ('Camera', 'Speaker') ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_privacy_settings;
SELECT device_id, data_sharing_preference, user_id FROM device_privacy_settings;
SELECT user_id, data_sharing_preference FROM device_privacy_settings WHERE data_sharing_preference = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, user_id FROM device_privacy_settings ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, user_id, data_sharing_preference FROM device_privacy_settings WHERE device_id < 100 AND user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM device_privacy_settings WHERE device_id = 1 AND user_id = 10
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY role DESC
SELECT device_id, user_id, data_sharing_preference FROM device_privacy_settings ORDER BY device_id ASC, user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(permission_id) AS permission_count FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(permission_id) > 1
SELECT user_id, SUM(CAST(read_permission AS INT)) AS total_read_permissions FROM permissions GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM Device;
SELECT device_id, device_name, user_id FROM Device ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT device_id, location FROM Device WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location, created_at FROM Device WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Device WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT * FROM Device WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM Device WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT d.device_id, d.device_name, u.username FROM Device d JOIN User u ON d.user_id = u.user_id WHERE d.location = 'Room B' AND u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT d.device_name, p.permission_type, p.granted FROM Device d JOIN Permission p ON d.device_id = p.device_id WHERE p.granted = TRUE;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(dl.log_id) AS log_count FROM User u LEFT JOIN DataLog dl ON u.user_id = dl.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING log_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT permission_type FROM permissions WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = '456e89b-12d3-a456-123e42661417';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE firmware_version = 'v1.0';
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM devices WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT device_name, owner_id, firmware_version FROM devices WHERE firmware_version LIKE 'v%';
SELECT devices.device_name, users.username FROM devices JOIN users ON devices.owner_id = users.user_id;
